Arrange courses from different platforms and providers in one placeâ€”CourseOnTime. Then, this tool will help you complete all of them! Along the way, it will also help you reduce unproductive screen time by combating your procrastination.
 
CourseOnTime is designed to optimise your online learning experience by providing insights into how you allocate time across various websites. The goal of this tool is to transform you into a more self-regulated learner, enabling you to maximise the use of your time effectively by providing feedback on your online behaviour.

Imagine using the time you spend browsing the news or scrolling through social media to learn a new language, acquire a novel skill or make strides towards your ambitions. What sets CourseOnTime apart from other time-management tools like RescueTime is our foundation in the state-of-the-art research in online learning, education, and AI.

This tool is specifically tailored to cater to the needs of learners engaged on platforms like Coursera, EdX, Futurelearn, Blackboard, and Moodle. Experience an improved learning journey with CourseOnTime, where your time is valued and well-spent.

Please note that the tool is currently in its evaluation stage and is offered for FREE. If you would like to request a feature or provide feedback on the tool, please get in touch via email at support@courseontime.com.
